Posts.Content: On Oct 22, 2014 11:37 PM janr888 wrote:  hi ,    I asked about that , I wanted to get a double masectomy just to be safe .  I was told I had no more chance of  getting cancer in the other breast then I would have if I had never been diagnosised with breast cancer at all . this is all so hard .   Hi, janr888.  I, too, wanted both removed but due to my health, heart failure, rheumatoid arthritis, chronic blood clot in left leg, the doctor recommends only the affected one be removed.
Posts.Title: SCARED
